subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Testosterone
Bicycles and Bicycling
News and News Media
lead_paragraph: Floyd Landis spoke to television stations and newspapers on Monday in hopes of repairing his reputation after being accused of cheating in the Tour de France.
snippet: Floyd Landis spoke to television stations and newspapers on Monday in hopes of repairing his reputation after being accused of cheating in the Tour de France.
